metadata.purpose: Behavioral interview prompts for expert response collection

prompts.question: Tell me about a time when you had to adapt to a significant change at work.
prompts.context_hint: Think about an example early in your career
follow_up_questions: What was the most challenging aspect of the change?
How did you help others adapt to the new situation?
What strategies do you use to stay flexible in uncertain situations?

prompts.question: Describe a situation where you had to analyze data to make a decision.
prompts.context_hint: Think about an example early in your career
follow_up_questions: What other approaches did you consider?
How did you validate that your solution was working?
What tools or resources did you use in your analysis?

prompts.question: Give me an example of when you implemented a process improvement.
prompts.context_hint: Think about an example in a senior role
follow_up_questions: What inspired this innovative approach?
How did you overcome resistance to your new idea?
What was the long-term impact of your innovation?

prompts.question: Describe a situation where you had to build consensus among stakeholders with different priorities.
prompts.context_hint: Think about an example early in your career
evaluation_focus: Contributes to team success beyond individual tasks
follow_up_questions: What specific role did you play in the team's success?
How did you handle any resistance or disagreement?
What did you learn about effective collaboration from this experience?

prompts.question: Give me an example of when priorities changed suddenly and you had to adjust.
prompts.context_hint: Think about an example early in your career
follow_up_questions: What was the most challenging aspect of the change?
How did you help others adapt to the new situation?
What strategies do you use to stay flexible in uncertain situations?

prompts.question: Tell me about a time when you had to navigate competing priorities from different stakeholders.
prompts.context_hint: Think about an example in a senior role
follow_up_questions: What techniques did you use to de-escalate the situation?
How did you ensure all parties felt heard?
What was the long-term impact on working relationships?

prompts.question: Give me an example of when you had to make a tough decision that affected your team.
prompts.context_hint: Think about an example early in your career
evaluation_focus: Shows ability to motivate and guide others
follow_up_questions: How did you measure the success of your leadership approach?
What would you do differently if you faced a similar situation again?
How did you ensure team buy-in for your decisions?

prompts.question: Give me an example of when you had to solve a problem with limited resources.
prompts.context_hint: Think about an example as you gained more experience
follow_up_questions: What other approaches did you consider?
How did you validate that your solution was working?
What tools or resources did you use in your analysis?

prompts.question: Tell me about a time when you had to explain a complex technical concept to non-technical stakeholders.
prompts.context_hint: Think about an example in a senior role
evaluation_focus: Builds rapport and trust through communication
follow_up_questions: How did you prepare for this communication?
What feedback did you receive on your communication style?
How did you ensure your message was understood?

prompts.question: Tell me about a time when you had to persuade someone to see things from your perspective.
prompts.context_hint: Think about an example early in your career
evaluation_focus: Builds rapport and trust through communication
follow_up_questions: How did you prepare for this communication?
What feedback did you receive on your communication style?
How did you ensure your message was understood?

prompts.question: Tell me about a time when your first approach to solving a problem didn't work.
prompts.context_hint: Think about an example in a senior role
follow_up_questions: What other approaches did you consider?
How did you validate that your solution was working?
What tools or resources did you use in your analysis?

prompts.question: Give me an example of when you received difficult customer feedback and how you handled it.
prompts.context_hint: Think about an example in a senior role
evaluation_focus: Understands and advocates for customer needs
follow_up_questions: How did you measure customer satisfaction with the outcome?
What did you learn about customer needs from this experience?
How do you balance customer requests with technical constraints?

prompts.question: Describe a situation where you had to balance customer needs with business constraints.
prompts.context_hint: Think about an example early in your career
evaluation_focus: Understands and advocates for customer needs
follow_up_questions: How did you measure customer satisfaction with the outcome?
What did you learn about customer needs from this experience?
How do you balance customer requests with technical constraints?

prompts.question: Give me an example of when you had to address a performance issue with a colleague.
prompts.context_hint: Think about an example in a senior role
follow_up_questions: What techniques did you use to de-escalate the situation?
How did you ensure all parties felt heard?
What was the long-term impact on working relationships?

prompts.question: Give me an example of when you had to solve a problem with limited resources.
prompts.context_hint: Think about an example in a senior role
follow_up_questions: What other approaches did you consider?
How did you validate that your solution was working?
What tools or resources did you use in your analysis?

prompts.question: Describe a situation where you disagreed with your manager's approach.
prompts.context_hint: Think about an example early in your career
follow_up_questions: What techniques did you use to de-escalate the situation?
How did you ensure all parties felt heard?
What was the long-term impact on working relationships?

prompts.question: Give me an example of when you had to make a tough decision that affected your team.
prompts.context_hint: Think about an example in a senior role
evaluation_focus: Shows ability to motivate and guide others
follow_up_questions: How did you measure the success of your leadership approach?
What would you do differently if you faced a similar situation again?
How did you ensure team buy-in for your decisions?

prompts.question: Give me an example of when you had to make a tough decision that affected your team.
prompts.context_hint: Think about an example as you gained more experience
evaluation_focus: Shows ability to motivate and guide others
follow_up_questions: How did you measure the success of your leadership approach?

How did you ensure team buy-in for your decisions?

prompts.question: Tell me about the most complex problem you've had to solve.
prompts.context_hint: Think about an example in a senior role
follow_up_questions: What other approaches did you consider?
How did you validate that your solution was working?
What tools or resources did you use in your analysis?

prompts.question: Describe a situation where you had to deliver bad news to your team or manager.
prompts.context_hint: Think about an example early in your career
evaluation_focus: Builds rapport and trust through communication
follow_up_questions: How did you prepare for this communication?
